senses.sense_definition: Relating to the mythical island of Atlantis, its people, or its civilization.

examples.text: The <w>Atlantean</w> civilization is often depicted as technologically advanced.
Scholars debated the origins of the <w>Atlantean</w> myths for centuries.

senses.sense_definition: Resembling the Greek Titan Atlas, especially in possessing immense strength or bearing a heavy burden.

examples.text: He lifted the heavy beam with <w>Atlantean</w> strength.
The team faced an <w>Atlantean</w> task to finish the project by morning.

senses.sense_definition: An inhabitant of the mythical island of Atlantis.

examples.text: Legends say the <w>Atlanteans</w> were a powerful seafaring people.
The story describes how the ancient <w>Atlanteans</w> escaped the flood.

senses.sense_definition: A sculpted male figure used as a column or support in architecture.

examples.text: Two stone <w>Atlanteans</w> supported the heavy balcony above the entrance.
The facade of the museum is decorated with muscular <w>Atlanteans</w>.

senses.sense_definition: The language fictionalized as being spoken by the inhabitants of Atlantis.

examples.text: The linguist tried to decipher the symbols of the <w>Atlantean</w> alphabet.
Fans of the movie learned to speak <w>Atlantean</w> fluently.
